dcterms:creator: S. Kumar
F. Spezzano
V. Subrahmanian
C. Faloutsos
dcterms:description: Bitcoin-Alpha is from a website where users can trade with Bitcoins. Because the Bitcoin accounts are anonymous, the users need to build online trust networks for their safety. Members of Bitcoin-Alpha rate other members in a scale of -10 (total distrust) to +10 (total trust) in steps of 1, which can help to prevent transactions with fraudulent and risky users.
dcterms:title: Bitcoin-Alpha

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
D. Huttenlocher
J. Kleinberg
dcterms:description: Slashdot is a technology-related news website where users are allowed to tag each other as friends or foes. In other words, it is a common signed social network with friends and enemies labels.
dcterms:title: Slashdot

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
D. Huttenlocher
J. Kleinberg
dcterms:description: Epinions was a product review site. Members of the site can indicate their trust or distrust of the reviews of others. The network reflects peopleâ€™s opinions to others.
dcterms:title: Epinions
